couldNotGetLocation: Could not get location information. Please move and try again.
badAccuracy: There is an error in the location information, so it may not operate normally.
soonKanaLast:
まもなく
しゅうてん
nextKanaLast:
つぎは
しゅうてん
menuNotice: From the next screen, press and hold the screen to open the menu.
notifySettingsTitle: Select the station you want to receive the arrival notification
firstAlertText: This app is not an official app of the railroad company, but a privately developed app. Please follow the instructions at the actual station and on the train.
dozeAlertText: If your smartphone supports battery optimization features, please disable battery optimization for the TrainLCD app in the settings application.
subwayAlertText: Operation is not guaranteed because it is difficult for radio waves to enter the subway line. Please be careful.
privacyDescription: To use the navigation feature of the TrainLCD app, you need to allow the app to access your location at all times. Location data will be collected in the background while the app is running to identify the nearest station from your current location. For more details, please refer to the privacy policy. Even if you do not grant permission to access your location, you can still use the app without confirming your current location by enabling Auto Mode.
privacyDenied: The app's settings do not allow it to retrieve location information, so actual location changes will not be reflected. Please enter your preferred departure station and enjoy.
privacyDeniedByDevice: Your device's settings do not allow for location data, so actual location changes will not be reflected. Please enter your preferred departure station and enjoy.
fetchLocationFailed: Failed to get the location information.
apiErrorText: We're sorry, the request couldn't be processed successfully. Please try again at a later time.
offlineText: It seems that your device is offline. Please try again when you are online.
offlineWarningText: Some functions are not available because your device is offline.
notificationNotGranted: To use this feature, you need to be configured to receive notifications.
bgAlertContent: TrainLCD is updating the nearest station in the background.
autoModeInProgress: Auto mode is enabled. In-app location will not affected by actual location changes.
reportCaution: Screenshots will be sent automatically. No personally identifiable information (such as location) will be sent.
reportError: Sorry, your feedback submission did not complete successfully. Please try again a few moments later.
reportPlaceholder: Required fields. Please provide as much detail as possible in your report, at least %{lowerLimit} characters. Never enter your own personal information.
reportSuccessText: Your feedback has been successfully completed.
reportConfirmText: The TrainLCD app is developed by a single individual. Depending on the content of your feedback, we may not be able to respond or may take some time to respond. Also, please refrain from sending multiple submissions with the same content. Please only send feedback if you understand the situation.
ttsAlertText: The automatic announcement feature does not work in silent mode or when the Internet is not connected. Please be careful.
bgTtsAlertText: When the background audio feature is enabled, sound will play even when silent mode is on. Please be especially mindful when on a train.
bgTtsAppClipAlertText: To use the background audio feature, please download the full version.
weekdayNotice: Weekday transit stations are included. The corresponding station will be displayed as a passage. Please be careful.
holidayNotice: Includes holiday transit stations. The corresponding station will be displayed as a passage. Please Be careful.
shareNotice: Press and hold the screen for easy sharing😊.
partiallyPassNotice: Includes stations where some trains pass. The corresponding station will be displayed as a stop. Please be careful.
partiallyPassBottomNotice: Some trains pass through %{stations}. Please be careful.
publishShareText: Check my location on the Train LCD!
publishProhibited: You cannot publish a position while subscribing to another person.
publisherNotReady: The publisher has not selected a destination.
appCrashedText: An unexpected problem has occurred with the app. We apologize for the inconvenience, but please try again from the beginning.
newVersionAvailableText:
A new version of TrainLCD is now available in the app store 🎉
Please update!
feedbackCharactersCountNotReached: Feedback must be at least %{lowerLimit} characters.
headerDelayTooShortErrorText: Header animation delay must be greater than the Header animation duration.
nanErrorText: The value must be entered numerically.
permissionsNotGranted: Since location data acquisition is not allowed, the actual location changes will not be reflected. You can allow it from the settings screen of your smartphone.
maintenanceText:
Sorry for the inconvenience, TrainLCD service is currently under maintenance.
Please check our status page or X (formerly Twitter) account @TrainLCD for more information on maintenance.
longPressNotice: Press and hold the screen to open the menu.
searchDestinationPlaceholder: Please enter the station name of your destination.
alwaysPermissionNotGrantedPanelText: Location access is not set to "Always Allow", so location updates will not occur when the TrainLCD app is not displayed. To change this setting, please go to your smartphone’s settings and select "Always Allow" for location access.
alwaysPermissionNotGrantedAlertText: Location access is not set to "Always Allow", so location updates will not occur while the TrainLCD app is not displayed. To use the TrainLCD app in the background, please set location access to “Always Allow.”
alwaysPermissionRequired: To use this feature, you need to enable "Always Allow" in the location settings. Please configure location access to "Always Allow" from your smartphone’s settings.
failedToRequestPermission: An error occurred while requesting "Always Allow" location access. Please manually set location access to "Always Allow" from your smartphone's settings.
failedToOpenSettings: Failed to open system settings. Please open the app settings manually.
setTerminusText: Set %{stationName} Station as the final destination
confirmChangeLineText: The current line is the %{currentLineName}. Should we switch to the %{lineName}?
trainTypeListEmpty: No matching train types were found.
